name: Trapped Hand
description:
Whenever this unit rolls a @{const}{sbac}{SBAC} during combat, choose to force foe to roll instead using their appropriate stat + 50, if applicable. On a success, this unit’s stat based activation ability activates.

Cannot be equipped with another “Hand” ability.

modifiers.trigger: bothif item|type|faith or arts|type|faith then 20 else 0 end

comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
